Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Development of ARI adversely affected the outcome after PBSCT .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| ARI (Azauridine or 1-β-D-arabinofuranosylcytosine) |
| PBSCT (Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Transplantation) |

Note: ARI is a chemical compound, specifically an antiviral nucleoside analogue used for the treatment of hepatitis B. PBSCT is a medical procedure, but since it involves the use of stem cells, it can be considered in relation to chemicals used in the process.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| ARI (Azauridine or 1-β-D-arabinofuranosylcytosine) |

Note: PBSCT (Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Transplantation) is a medical procedure and does not refer to a specific chemical entity.
